description: When attempting to decorate a function that takes in bytes as an argument, a compile/runtime error is thrown that states "TypeError: Decorator cannot be applied to a function with a byte argument".
output:
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
  File "<stdin>", line 6, in my_function
TypeError: my_function() missing 1 required positional argument: 'b'
